column1: Kata Robata////The quality of the fish here is amazing. I came here for a double date and we had the melt in your mouth kobe beef skewers as well as multiple simple sushi pieces
column2: topped off my the lobster mac and cheese. It was an amazing and decadent meal. My only complaint is that I wish the wine by the glass prices were better. We opted to get a bottle for around $50 as the glass prices were $14-$16
column3: which is just silly. There should be a $10 option
column4: sorry guys but it's not THAT fancy in there.
